name: Deathdays End
description: With all adults across the world out of commission, everyone below the age of eighteen is forced to participate in a Death Game when the perpetrator reveals themselves on TV. Play through the eyes of multiple characters in a mystery/thriller visual novel like no other.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: 1280x720 or better required
